title: Blackstone River Valley National Historical Park: 4 The Parklands
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Self Guided Walking Tours     Hopedale Self GuidedTour     4 The Parklands                  4 The Parklands        Boating race in the Parklands NPS        From the Little Red Shop, you can see the Parklands stretching along the eastern shores of Hopedale Pond, with the path beginning behind the beach. Before the turn of the century, the Drapers hired Warren Henry Manning, who had helped develop Boston's regional park system, to design a public park around the pond. If time permits, enjoy a stroll through this carefully planned woodland comprised of over 250 acres.      Jump to Introduction 1 Adin Ballou Park 2 Factory Site 3 Little Red Shop 5 Dutcher Street Company Housing 6 Unitarian Church and Town Hall 7 Bancroft Memorial Library
